title: re:  trying to load mozilla.vpn and receive a "general application error"
content:
Hello All, 

 I am trying to load mozilla's vpn and always receive a black screen that says "General application error. Something went wrong.  Please try again later."  It seems strange and I wonder if a setting on my Wind.10 OS is the cause.     Any advice/support will be appreciated.  T

title: How to sync Firefox with Tor browser
content: How can I sync Tor browser with Firefox?
creator: hguldad

title: Firefox hangs when starting alternate profile on Mac
content:
I am on Mac OS 11.1 with Firefox 85.0.1 have an alternate profile called "no-adblock", when I start it from about:profile it opens the window but it hangs indefinitely with a beach ball.

I have started it with this command: /Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox --foreground --P no-adblock

But it hangs just the same. No log output. How can I debug this? Is there a way to get the debug output?
creator: grant.west

title: When I click on the Firefox icon to get in the browser, I get 8 Firefox browser pages ! How fix ?
content: When I click on the Firefox icon to get into the browser, I get 8 Firefox browser pages ! How fix ?
creator: biggst_j

title: New Tabs page is Reset - all saved tabs are GONE !????
content: Magically? As in Evil, Stupid Magic. Turn off computer. Turn back on 2 hours later: New Tabs page has Completely Reset. All Saved Tabs are gone? Really. Who thought this was a good idea? Let's fuck with the users and screw their saved bookmarks. Nice. Twice, over the past 2 months. And, my other extensions should In No Fucking Way be the Issue. C'mon developers, quit trying to make Firefox 'prettier'..! Just make it work consistently.
creator: barguybrady

title: Tabs Recovery
content: Hi, this isn't quite a tab recovery as the session hasn't ended, it just won't display the window. But it's in private browsing so I don't want to close the window since I understand that nothing will be saved from that session. But is there somewhere I can access a list of tabs while the session still exists? I'd hate to lose them all.
creator: Osvetnik

title: Google hyperlinks in News open an interim page
content: Lately I've noticed several Google News hyperlinks, instead of opening the page, instead open a static page with the hyperlink typed out, for example: "Opening https://www.popularmechanics.com/science/a35423435/scientists-testing-quantum-time-theory-inside-nuclear-reactor/", and under it "Close" Nothing happens. I have to click the link. Why is this happening? PC i7 1660 super 32GB RAM browser up to date.
creator: promytius

title: Blocking automatic audio/video play stopped working, how do I fix??
content: I recently changed options to connect to all websites via https under Privacy & Security, could that be the reason? I wouldn't think that has anything to do with it but then I'm not expert tech-wise. Thank you!
creator: jj
